member.name: IShellService.SetOwner
member.summary: Deprecated. Declares an owner reference to the service object.
member.param: The address of an interface pointer to the owner object. If NULL, the object should call to release the existing reference.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellService
member.summary: Deprecated. IShellService Exposes one method that declares ownership when a service component implementing a certain interface is shared among multiple clients, such as Windows Internet Explorer and Windows Explorer.
